pkgmetadata.longdescription: NVIDIA container runtime toolkit, build and run containers leveraging NVIDIA GPUs. tl;dr: nvidia-docker is deprecated because docker now has native gpu support, which this package is required to use. The NVIDIA Container Toolkit (formerly known as NVIDIA Docker) allows containers to access full GPU acceleration. OpenGL, OpenCL and CUDA are supported for production use. Vulkan support is currently in beta. This only works for Linux containers running on Linux host systems with NVIDIA GPUs.
